measure: Canton provides information and access to experts to responsibles of old people's homes
launched the campaign #Seifenboss, with guidelines for schools, daycares and parents
public or private events with 100 people or more are forbidden
daycare centers, after-school clubs and play groups have to stop regular operations
All kidergardens and daycare centers closed
visit ban in hospitals and hospices
contact cantonal offices can be visited only by telephonic agreement and direct invitation
appeal to the elderly, if you're older that 65 stay at home, with flyer distributed by members of the civil protection
Opening of an ambulant testing center in Breitenbach
Mobile testing teams of canton Basel-Landschaft also cover districts of Dorneck and Thierstein
Facility for elderly infected established at Allerheiligenberg
